law.text: The commissioner shall be more than twenty-eight (28) years of age; shall be a citizen of the United States; and shall be selected on the basis of training, experience and qualifications for this position and preferably shall have at least five (5) years experience in public or police administration.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 299, sec. 5. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 23. -- Amended 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 255, sec. 10. -- Amended 1956 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 7, Art. X, sec. 5. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 57, sec. 6. -- Created 1948 Ky. Acts ch. 80. sec. 3.
